name: Sacred Geometry #2
description:
“When we awaken from sleep, it is said that the nightscape dissolves into the substrate. And when we fall asleep, likewise the day-scape dissolves into the same space." Alan Wallace, author of "Dream Yourself Awake”.

The connection between sky and earth, outside and within. Sacred Geometry is part of the project Impermanent Sculptures.

I dare to bring such invisible realms into existence through a real image, here available as my second NFT. 

Sacred Geometry #2 (edition of 2), is part of the project Impermanent Sculptures, started in 2015 and is still ongoing. It is the result of laser-cut stencils plates, fire sparkles and light painting photography done on-sight with later adjustments on Photoshop.
.
.
.
Vitor Schietti’s work is dedicated to the visual representations of dreams and memories as building blocks of one’s identity. His motifs go from landscape to portrait, often applying long exposure and light-painting techniques.
